instructions.1: Start in a push-up position with your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.

instructions.2: Extend one arm straight out to the side, parallel to the ground.

instructions.3: Lower your body by bending your elbows, keeping your back straight and core engaged.

instructions.4: Repeat on the other side, extending the opposite arm out to the side.

instructions.5: Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

instructions.1: Start in a high plank position with your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart and your body in a straight line.

instructions.2: Lower your chest towards the ground by bending your elbows, keeping them close to your body.

instructions.3: Push through your palms to extend your arms and return to the starting position.

instructions.4: Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

instructions.1: Start in a high plank position with your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.

instructions.2: Lower your body towards the ground by bending your elbows, keeping your core engaged.

instructions.3: Push through your palms explosively to propel your body off the ground.

instructions.4: While in mid-air, clap your hands together before landing back in the starting position.

instructions.5: Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

instructions.1: Lie flat on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and your back pressed against the bench.

instructions.2: Grasp the barbell with an overhand grip slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.

instructions.3: Lift the barbell off the rack and hold it directly above your chest with your arms fully extended.

instructions.4: Lower the barbell slowly towards your chest, keeping your elbows tucked in.

instructions.5: Pause for a moment when the barbell touches your chest.

instructions.6: Push the barbell back up to the starting position by extending your arms.

instructions.7: Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

instructions.1: Set up an incline bench at a 45-degree angle.

instructions.2: Lie down on the bench with your feet flat on the ground.

instructions.3: Grasp the barbell with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.

instructions.4: Unrack the barbell and lower it slowly towards your chest, keeping your elbows at a 45-degree angle.

instructions.5: Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push the barbell back up to the starting position.

instructions.6: Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

instructions.1: Lie on a decline bench with your feet secured and your head lower than your hips.

instructions.2: Grasp the barbell with an overhand grip slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.

instructions.3: Unrack the barbell and lower it slowly towards your chest, keeping your elbows tucked in.

instructions.4: Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push the barbell back up to the starting position.

instructions.5: Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

instructions.1: Attach the handles to the cables at chest height.

instructions.2: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, facing away from the cable machine.

instructions.3: Grasp the handles with an overhand grip, palms facing forward.

instructions.4: Step forward slightly to create tension in the cables.

instructions.5: Keep your core engaged and your back straight throughout the exercise.

instructions.6: With a slight bend in your elbows, slowly bring your arms forward and together in front of your chest.

instructions.7: Squeeze your chest muscles at the peak of the movement.

instructions.8: Slowly reverse the movement, returning your arms to the starting position.

instructions.9: Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

instructions.1: Adjust the cable pulleys to chest height.

instructions.2: Stand in the center of the cable machine with one foot in front of the other.

instructions.3: Grasp the handles with your palms facing down and your arms extended out to the sides.

instructions.4: Take a step forward, keeping your arms slightly bent.

instructions.5: With a slight bend in your elbows, bring your hands together in front of your chest.

instructions.6: Pause for a moment, then slowly return your arms back to the starting position.

instructions.7: Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

instructions.1: Lie flat on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and your back pressed against the bench.

instructions.2: Hold a dumbbell in each hand, with your palms facing forward and your arms extended above your chest.

instructions.3: Lower the dumbbells slowly to the sides of your chest, keeping your elbows at a 90-degree angle.

instructions.4: Pause for a moment, then push the dumbbells back up to the starting position, fully extending your arms.

instructions.5: Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

instructions.1: Lie flat on a bench with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing each other.

instructions.2: Extend your arms straight up over your chest, with a slight bend in your elbows.

instructions.3: Keeping a slight bend in your elbows, lower your arms out to the sides in a wide arc until you feel a stretch in your chest.

instructions.4: Pause for a moment, then reverse the movement and bring the dumbbells back up to the starting position.

instructions.5: Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.
